Translations.Text: The Revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Almighty (Al-Aziz, Supreme in Power), All Wise (Al-Hakeem, Full of Wisdom)
Surely, in the heavens and the earth, are Signs for the believers (those who believe)
And in the creation (of yourselves) and the moving creatures that are spread (through the earth), are Signs for those of firm Faith

And in the alteration of night and day, and in the rain that Allah sends down from the sky, and with it, (He) rebuilds the earth after its death, and in the change of the winds (from the fair winds to the violent storms)â€” Are Signs for those who are wise
These are the Signs of Allah (verses), which We read (and recite) to you in truth: Then in what form will they believe after (rejecting) Allah and His Signs
Shame (and misery) for each sinful person who deals with lies
(To him) who hears the Signs (verses) of Allah recited to him yet, is unchanging (stubborn, haughty) and alone, as if he had not heard them: So tell him about a painful penalty
And when he learns something of Our Signs (the Verses), he takes them as a joke: For such there will be a demeaning penalty

In front of them, there is Hell: And anything they have worked for is of no use to them, and of no use any protectors they may have taken to themselves besides Allah: And for them is a very severe penalty
This is (Quran, the true) Guidance. And for those who reject the Signs of their Lord, for them is a grievous penalty of utmost pain
